title: AI 문해력 격차가 만드는 새로운 디지털 디바이드
generation_method: Gallery-Quality Meta-Prompt Strategy + Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview

feature.concept: Digital Chasm - Binary division showing AI vs traditional learning
feature.style: Contemporary minimalism with professional infographic elements

content-1.concept: The Enlightened vs The Excluded - Tenebrism composition
content-1.style: Georges de La Tour candlelit paintings + modern data visualization

content-2.concept: Bridging the Divide - Educational pathway connections
content-2.style: Clean geometric bridge metaphors with strategic color accents

main.style: Mondrian geometric abstraction + data visualization design

body-1.concept: Digital Natives vs Digital Immigrants - Generational contrast
body-1.style: Smooth organic forms vs angular pixelated elements

body-2.concept: The Learning Curve - Spiral progression with obstacles
body-2.style: Modern infographic with upward dynamic flow

body-3.style: Radial spreading from warm center to cool periphery

feed.concept: The Great Divide - Perfect binary split composition
feed.style: Warhol pop art + minimal conceptual art with duotone contrast

story.style: Purple to cyan gradient with ascending data visualization
